name: Pureology
description:
Started in California in 2001, Pureology is a brand specifically focused on colour-treated hair, and a pioneer of the ‘no nasties’ movement. Pureology is one of the first haircare brands to develop 100% vegan formulas, made with sustainably-sourced natural plant extracts and without animal products. 

At AllHair.ie you will find a fantastic selection of Pureology’s world-famous ZeroSulfate®Shampoos & Conditioners to suit all needs. We particularly love the thickening Pureology – Fullfyl Shampoo that delivers fuller-looking hair, with Pureology’s signature AntiFade complex added to keep your color vibrant and shiny. We also stock a selection of Pureology Treatments & Masks for intensive nourishment as well as Styling products: all enriched with Pureology’s signature aromatherapy blends that will soothe the senses as you look after your hair.

Here at AllHair.ie we make it our mission to bring you the most luxurious and high-performing haircare brands on the market today, and we are Irish-owned - so you can order online with confidence.
page_title: Pureology : Sulfate Free Hair Products For Coloured Hair
meta_description: Pureology is a professional sulfate free hair care brand with shampoo, conditioner and styling products for colour treated hair. Order today for fast delivery

name: Treatments & Masks
description: Overdone it with heat styling, colouring sessions or bleaching, and now your hair is looking brittle, dull and in need of some serious TLC? Whether your preference is for deeply moisturizing cream masks, light serums or leave-in formulas, here at AllHair.ie you will find the perfect Pureology Treatment for your needs. Pureology Colour Fanatic is the multi-tasking leave-in hair treatment spray that provides 21 benefits to prime, protect, and perfect colour-treated hair. Pureology Color Fanatic will seal cuticles, reduce dryness and frizz and even work as a hair smoothing and shine treatment! Pureology Pure Hydrate Shine Max is the lightweight serum that will instantly smooth flyaways and add vibrant shine, while keeping colour radiant. For a deeper level of hydration, try a Pureology Mask like Pureology Pure Hydrate Super Food Mask - with Avocado and Coconut oil, it will moisturize and create a smooth, frizz-free finish. And Pureology Strength Cure Superfood Mask is the intensive treatment to nourish dry, damaged hair for immediate improvement for hair in crisis. Match your Pureology Treatment & Mask with your perfect Pureology Shampoo & Conditioner, and bring your hair back to life!  Order Pureology today, from InHealth.ie: we are Irish and deliver nationwide!

name: Nioxin
description:
Nioxin is a known and trusted haircare brand specifically focused on hair loss and hair thinning: a widespread issue that affects 50% of all men and women. All Nioxin’s customized technologies deliver thicker, fuller-looking hair without side effects, so you can thrive with newfound confidence.

Nioxin delivers a complete hair program that includes Shampoos & Conditioners, Scalp Treatments and a comprehensive range of System Kits tailored to specific hair types. These include Nioxin - System Kit 2 (Noticeably Thinning, Fine), which amplifies hair texture while refreshing the scalp and protecting against breakage, andNioxin System Kit 4 (Thinning, Fine, Treated), designed specifically for coloured hair with progressed thinning. It will deliver deeply cleansed, denser-looking hair with restored moisture balance.

Check out our full selection of Nioxin products right here on AllHair.ie, incuding Treatment Masques and Intensive Boosters. Remember to order before 2pm to get next working day delivery straight to your home!

name: Moroccanoil
description:
Moroccanoil started its brand journey from a single, revolutionary product: the now iconic and multi-award winner Moroccanoil Treatment Oil. Did you know that it was originally developed by brand co-founder Carmen Tal to restore her own hair to health, after a hair colouring service gone wrong? Moroccanoil has since expanded to offer an exciting range of Shampoos & Conditioners to suit all hair types, Treatments & Hair Masks and even Styling. All Moroccanoil products are infused with the brand’s signature antioxidant-rich Argan oil and aim to restore health and shine to all types of hair.

In addition to haircare, Moroccanoil now also offers a luxurious Body Range: try the divinely scented Moroccanoil Body Pure Argan Oil - it will instantly transport you to a relaxing beachside Spa! And for your actual holidays, we have a brilliant range of Moroccanoil Travel Sizes for all hair needs.

At AllHair.ie we deliver nationwide: order before 2pm and receive your delivery the next working day!

description: We often ask of our hair more than we really should: frequent heat styling sessions like straightening and blow-drying, bleaching, coloring – the list goes on. The result? Dryness, split ends, breakage, and all the softness of straw! This is why it is important to incorporate specific conditioning Treatments & Masks a part of our weekly haircare routine. Here at AllHair.ie you will find a fabulous selection of Alfaparf Treatments and Alfaparf Masks to suit all hair types and tackle any issues. Alfaparf SDL Reconstruction Reparative Mask will strengthen, restructure and add moisture to hair whilst also protecting its color intensity. And for fine hair with a tendency to hair loss, Alfaparf Scalp Care Energising Lotion (for Hair Loss) will activate & revitalize the environment of the follicle so that hair appears fuller, bouncier & healthier looking.
